author: anmenaga
body:
Added tests for Trace-Command that increase code coverage to 80%~85% per class.

Fix #4151

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @anmenaga take a look at https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4201 on how to get coverage for Getters/Dispose/StopProcessing using api

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT @adityapatwardhan This PR is ready for further review

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Do you have any additional concerns? If not, please approve

title: Trace-Command tests for code coverage
